title: fix: subcircuit having multiple traces between same pins
description: Fixes autorouter bug where subcircuits could have multiple traces between the same pins, causing redundant routing and errors. Now, only unrouted traces are considered for autorouting, preventing duplicate connections.
body: `getSimpleRouteJsonFromCircuitJson` collects all the `source_trace` elements whose `subcircuit_id` is this group OR any descendant sub-circuit (even when that subcircuit is having traces which is already routed). And then that simpleRouteJson is passed to the autorouter where the already resolved `source_trace` gets dragged.

title: fix net ids on schematic net labels
description: Fixes incorrect assignment of net IDs to schematic net labels, ensuring that net labels reference the correct source net ID instead of the net name.

title: Automatic net label orientation based on connectsTo
description: Net labels in schematics now automatically orient themselves based on the position of the connected port, improving label placement and readability.

title: check for gh user name instead of account id for settings dialog, to make sure it is shown  locally

title: feat: Restrict AI review generation to package owners
description: Restricts the ability to generate or re-generate AI reviews to only the package owner, preventing other authenticated users from accessing this functionality.
body:
This pull request introduces a security enhancement that limits the ability to generate or re-generate AI reviews to only the package owner. Previously, any authenticated user had access to this functionality.

---

### ðŸ”’ Changes Implemented

#### `src/components/ViewPackagePage/components/important-files-view.tsx`

* Added a `packageAuthorId` prop to the component.
* Replaced the `useUser` hook with `useGlobalStore` to retrieve the currently logged-in user's session info.
* Conditionally render the **"Request AI Review"** and **"Re-request AI Review"** buttons only when the logged-in user's `github_username` matches the `packageAuthorId`.

#### `src/components/ViewPackagePage/components/repo-page-content.tsx`

* Passed the `packageAuthorOwner` (sourced from `packageInfo.owner_github_username`) as a prop to the `ImportantFilesView` component.

title: Fix caching issue by rounding the deltas with a higher precision
description: Fixes a bug where cached results in the unravelMultiSectionSolver could be missed due to insufficient rounding precision of delta values, leading to inconsistent caching behavior.
body:
### Why are we changing this?
We've observed cases where the `unravelMultiSectionSolver` was not completely caches during the second time it was solved. The working theory was that there were some rounding issues causing this.

### What has changed?
Delta values used in in the cached values of the `unravelMultiSectionSolver` are now rounded to a higher precision than the coordinates. This prevents issues from accumulated errors due to rounding.

### Visualisation
https://streamable.com/yr0hm1

title: design012
description: Adds a new schematic design (design012) featuring four 0.1uF capacitors with specific manual placements and netlabels for V3_3 and GND, to the schematic-corpus repository.
body: ![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/6d6a1c20-c4fb-4dc3-b165-097c4e1c5a8c)

title: design011
description: Adds a new 32.768kHz crystal oscillator circuit design (design011) with two 15pF capacitors and ground netlabels to the schematic-corpus repository.
body: ![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/b12a9834-4df4-4b4f-8751-0e22b7d078a8)

title: Update BPC Generation to include netlabels
description: Updates dependencies to support BPC generation with netlabels by bumping 'circuit-json-to-bpc' and 'tscircuit' versions, and adds '@types/bun' to types in tsconfig.

title: Add @tscircuit/cli downstream dependency
description: Adds @tscircuit/cli as a dependency, categorizes it as 'Downstream' in the dependency graph, and tests its recognition as such.
body:
## Summary
- track `@tscircuit/cli` in dependency graph
- categorize `@tscircuit/cli` as `Downstream`
- test that new package is recognized as downstream
- install `@tscircuit/cli`

## Testing
- `bun test tests`
- `bun run format` *(fails: Script not found)*

title: Refactor internal layout
description: Refactors the internal algorithm code by moving logic out of the `claude` folder into a new `lib` structure, modularizing core cell boundary calculation logic, and updating imports and file names for improved maintainability; no user-facing functionality changes.
body:
## Summary
- move algorithm internals out of `claude` folder
- rename `types.ts` used inside the algorithm to `internalTypes.ts`
- update imports across the library
- rename example component to `cell-boundaries.tsx`

## Testing
- `bun test tests`
